title: Ticket #2276: Debug message in uids.cpp is misleading
description: I noticed that this message was erroneous. Not sure that there are no others lurking around. This is an insignificant bug; let's fix it anyway.
check_ins: 2011-Jun-28 13:38   Check-in [22310]: Noticed this debug message is misleading ===GT=== #2276 ===VersionHistory=== Fix debug message pointing to wrong code, which referred erroneously to set_user_euid(), instead of to the correct set_owner_euid() (By Nathan W. Panike )
creator: nwp
